full_summary:
**Title**
Re-tender Phase 2 EZ899-240129: Concrete Rehabilitation of the Sikanni Chief River Bridge

**Reference**: WS4012343938-Doc4077485417

**Publication Date**: June 29, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: Wednesday, July 6, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Procurement Details**
We are soliciting tender for Contract EZ899-240129, Phase 2, Concrete Rehabilitation of the Sikanni Chief River Bridge. The anticipated contract period shall commence on a date to be mutually agreed upon and terminate on October 6, 2023.

**Pre-qualification**: Suppliers must have previously qualified to participate in this tender. Tenderers are selected based solely on the lowest price among qualified bidders. This competitive procurement follows the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to suppliers from all regions, with delivery and associated work to take place in the province of British Columbia within Canada.

**Project Details**
The scope of work includes the concrete rehabilitation of the Sikanni Chief River Bridge.

**Key Information**
* Tender status: Expired
* Unspsc code: 72141107 (Bridge construction and repair service)
* Procurement category: CNST
* Notice type: Invitation to Qualify
* Procurement method: Selective tendering
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of delivery: British Columbia, Canada

**Contact Information**
For any questions or inquiries, please contact:
* Tian Lam (SPAC/PSPC), Tel: (phone not provided), Email: <tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>, Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada. 
**Note**: The contact details provided in this rewritten entry were taken from the original government doc as currently available, so the email, phone and fax details are exactly as found there - note they may or may not be complete.
